dataformat.name: protobuf
dataformat.title: Protobuf
dataformat.description: Serialize and deserialize Java objects using Google's Protocol buffers.
dataformat.label: dataformat,transformation

instanceClass.description: Name of class to use when unmarshalling

contentTypeFormat.description: Defines a content type format in which protobuf message will be serialized/deserialized from(to) the Java been. The format can either be native or json for either native protobuf or json fields representation. The default value is native.

contentTypeHeader.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSON
